introduction: The video discusses building a job board app using React, Express, Redis, and a Node.js cron job. The app will fetch jobs from a single job board API, filter them down through an algorithm, and store them in Redis. The front-end will display a list of jobs, and the back-end will handle the API and Redis connections.

sections.title: Section 1: Setting up the project
content: Installing Redis and the Node.js client library

sections.title: Section 2: Fetching jobs from the API
content: Filtering jobs down through the algorithm

sections.title: Section 4: Building the front-end
content: Creating a simple React component for displaying jobs
Creating a component for filtering jobs

sections.title: Section 5: Deploying the app
content: Setting up a domain and DNS
Starting the React app and the Node.js cron job
Deploying the app to the public internet
